meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Conopholis, also known as cancer-root or bear corn, that is parasitic on the roots of oak trees.
meanings.sent1: The squawroot grew under the oak tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a squawroot while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels played around the squawroot, mistaking it for a tiny house.
meanings.sent4: The squawroot clung to the oak tree like a tiny, sneaky thief.
meanings.sent5: The squawroot's yellow flowers stood out against the dark oak bark.

meanings.definition: The root of this plant, used in traditional medicine for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea using squawroot for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: The squawroot root was dried and ground into a powder.
meanings.sent3: The squawroot root was so potent that it seemed to have magical powers.
meanings.sent4: The squawroot's root was like a treasure chest of natural remedies.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the squawroot root filled the room with earthy goodness.
